summary: A masked killer begins murdering students on the school track team after a track runner dies upon completion of a 30 second 200-meter race.

Peaker|Michael Pataki|Richard Balin|Carmen Argenziano|Beverly Dixon|Virgil Frye|Hal Bokar|Denise Cheshire|Bill Hufsey|Linnea Quigley|Karen Abbott|Vanna White|Ruth Ann Llorens|Tom Hintnaus|Carl Rey|Patrick Wright|Aaron Butler|Viola Kates Stimpson|Erica Hope|Grant Loud|Felony|Fred Beshid|Deborah Dutch|Linda Shayne
keywords: slasher flick|track and field|female nudity|pole vault|murder
title: El día de la graduación
